wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Lawrie (15 December 1934 – 26 August 1979) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a right winger. Lawrie made over 300 appearances in the Football League between 1952 and 1966.

response: * 26 August 1979 – Sam Lawrie, 44, former Middlesbrough and Charlton Athletic winger.
